attributes.action: Help free Gillian Gibbons and stop all financial aid to Sudan from Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like to free Gillian Gibbons from prison in Sudan by stopping all financial aid and business dealings with Sudan.

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
